item.title: CVE-2024-43126|2024-08-13T13:31:44.548Z -- sender -- sender%20%E2%80%93%20newsletter%2C%20sms%20and%20email%20marketing%20automation%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sender Sender – Newsletter, SMS and Email Marketing Automation for WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Sender – Newsletter, SMS and Email Marketing Automation for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.6.14.
